snippet.title: Blood Spear (Video Game Trailer 2021)
snippet.description:
ISART DIGITAL, the video game and 3D animation / VFX School.
Graduation Video Game  

Platform: PC 
Engine: Unreal
Number of players: 1
Genre: Action/Adventure

The Blood Spear has awaken and it wants blood. A lot of blood. Throw to impale and kill from afar, defeat powerful foes to absorb their lifeblood. Progress through grandiose environments and carry out your gruesome vengeance in this epic third-person action adventure.

--

La Blood Spear s’est réveillée, et elle a soif de sang. Lancez pour empaler et tuer à distance, vainquez de puissants ennemis pour absorber leur sang. Progressez a travers des environnements grandioses et exécutez votre vengeance macabre dans cet épique action-aventure a la 3eme personne.

Ready to play Blood Spear ? https://isart-digital.itch.io/bloodspear

Game & Level Designer - VFX Artist : Clément DESCHAMPS
Game Designer - Boss Scripter & Designer : Louis LANGLET
3D Enviro/Props Artist : Quentin LE GOFF
Game & Level Designer : Erwan MAUPAS
3D Character Artist : Antoine RAMPALY
3D Texture Artist - Tech Artist - Enviro/Props : Thibaut REIMEL
3C & AI Designer - Scripter : Irwin SEGARANE
Game Designer : Nils TRAUN

________________________

🔗 www.isart.fr
📱 Facebook : facebook.com/ISARTDigital
🎙️ Twitter : twitter.com/isartdigital
📷 Instagram : instagram.com/isartdigital
💼 LinkedIn : fr.linkedin.com/company/isart-digital
▶️ Youtube : youtube.com/user/ISARTDIGITAL

Abonnez-vous à la chaîne
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJsCSgLeOr5f-WwlgP2XkKg?sub_confirmation=1
